General.Name: China Merchants Property Operation & Service Co Ltd
General.Description: China Merchants Property Operation & Service Co., Ltd. develops and manages real estate properties. It also offers property management, asset management, and other services. The company was formerly known as AVIC SUNDA Holding Company Limited and changed its name to China Merchants Property Operation and Service Co., Ltd. in December 2019. China Merchants Property Operation & Service Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: China Merchants Accumulation Building, Shenzhen, China, 518067

4.Name: Mr. Xiang  Yang
